required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Zebutinib Combined With Immunochemotherapy in the Treat of Newly Treated CLL Patients Without 17p-/TP53 Mutation
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase III, Single-arm Clinical Trial of Zebutinib Combined With Immunochemotherapy With Limited Course of Treatment for Newly Treated Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia Patients Without 17p-

lead_sponsor.agency: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

clinical_study.source: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate limited course of treatment of Zebutinib combined with immunochemotherapy for patients with newly treated chronic lymphocytic leukemia without 17p-/TP53 mutation

primary_outcome.measure: MRD conversion rate (minimal residual disease conversion rate)

arm_group.description: Zebutinib Combined With FCR( under 60 years of age) or BR (over 60 years of age )

intervention.description: Introduction period: Zebutinib 160 mg bid oral treatment for 3 months;Joint stage :6 sessions of Zebutinib FCR( under 60 years of age,Fludarabine 25 mg/m² Q3W, Cyclophosphamide 250 mg/m² Q3W,Rituximab 375 mg/m² Q3W) or BR (over 60 years of age, )(28 days and 1 cycle);Maintenance treatment: after the end of the combined phase, continue the treatment of zebutinib.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University
